meanings.sent1: In the classroom, the students formed a groupoid to work on the project together.
meanings.sent2: The children playing in the park formed a small groupoid to play tag.
meanings.sent3: The groupoid of friends decided to have a picnic in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The groupoid of birds chirped happily in the tree branches.
meanings.sent5: The groupoid of colorful flowers brightened up the garden.

meanings.definition: A mathematical structure similar to a group, but with a partial binary operation.
meanings.sent1: The mathematicians studied the properties of a groupoid in their research.
meanings.sent2: The groupoid in the algebraic equation helped simplify the calculations.
meanings.sent3: The groupoid of numbers danced around the chalkboard in the math class.
meanings.sent4: The groupoid of stars twinkled in the night sky like interconnected points.
meanings.sent5: The groupoid of shapes transformed under the mathematical transformations.
